# optionalPermissions

**Instance Property**

The set of permissions that the extension may need for optional functionality.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var optionalPermissions: Set<WKWebExtension.Permission> { get }
```

## Discussion

These permissions can be requested by the extension at a later time.
title: optionalPermissions
